comments:
I get the following exception logged whenever I close a project. There are really two issues here. The firast is that it appears that the settings for a project are trying to be written during a resource delta when the workspace cannot be modifed. The other issue is that the project I closed is not a web project so it is odd that the web tooling is tryting to save preferences for it.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 4 2006-05-01 12:15:04.480
!MESSAGE Exception occurred while saving project preferences: /org.eclipse.team.examples.library.view/.settings/org.eclipse.wst.validation.prefs.
!STACK 1
org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ResourceException: The resource tree is locked for modifications.
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.WorkManager.checkIn(WorkManager.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.prepareOperation(Workspace.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1732)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectPreferences.save(ProjectPreferences.java:581)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.preferences.EclipsePreferences.flush(EclipsePreferences.java:352)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.ProjectPreferences.flush(ProjectPreferences.java:379)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ProjectConfiguration.store(ProjectConfiguration.java:636)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.ConfigurationManager.closing(ConfigurationManager.java:195)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.EventManager.closing(EventManager.java:117)
	at org.eclipse.wst.validation.internal.EventManager.resourceChanged(EventManager.java:300)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager$2.run(NotificationManager.java:280)
	at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java(Compiled Code))
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.notify(NotificationManager.java:274)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.handleEvent(NotificationManager.java:246)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.broadcastEvent(Workspace.java:250)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Project.close(Project.java:186)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.CloseResourceAction.invokeOperation(CloseResourceAction.java:184)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceAction.execute(WorkspaceAction.java:134)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceAction$2.runInWorkspace(WorkspaceAction.java:429)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.InternalWorkspaceJob.run(InternalWorkspaceJob.java:38)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
!SUBENTRY 1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 380 2006-05-01 12:15:04.502
!MESSAGE The resource tree is locked for modifications.
I should add that I am using Eclipse 3.2 RC2 with everything loaded from the Callisto update site.
Vijay, Hope you don't mind, I've set priority to '2', just to help reflect the high visibility of this issue. Please keep us updated on status/outlook.
Closing to avoid e-mail reminder to verify.

traces.message: The resource tree is locked for modifications.
